story.text: Jan 3 (Reuters) - ANGIODYNAMICS INC. (ANGO.O) Latest Forecast* No. of Yr ago analysts qtr EPS (diluted, $/shr) 0.15 0.13 7 0.13 Net ($ million) 2.5 -- -- 1.7 Net sales ($ million) 24.4 24.0 7 18.7 *Source: Reuters Estimates --The provider of medical devices said excluding the impact of stock-based compensation, net income for the latest second quarter was $2.9 million, or 18 cents a share. (Reporting by Rajeshwari Sharma in Bangalore)
